title: Capital Investor
para1: The Capital Investor allows you to spend hard earned Money on lucrative rewards. For details on acquiring Money, refer to its page:
para2: To use the Capital Investor, you will need to put your Money inside it. This can be accomplished manually using a bucket or similar tool, or automatically by using pipes. MegaCorp does not manufacture any pipes of its own, so you will need to turn to third-party solutions if you wish to go down this route.
para3: Finally, to make the purchase, you need simply click on your desired reward, and press the Buy button. The Money will be consumed, and your reward will immediately take effect.
para4: More details on any given reward can be had by simply mousing over the info icon on the right.
